name: Switcher Moves
flavor: Wait, weren't you just over there a second ago?
text: Moves labeled with the word Switcher have two different effects depending on what type of battle the user is taking place in. In the case of having backup pokemon, the user can choose to switch out with said pokemon using this move. In the case that there aren't any backup pokemon, they gain a +1 to evasion until their next turn.
